Automatic expansion handling:

```js
<AutoExpansionPanelGroup>
  <AutoExpansionPanel>
    <ExpansionPanelHeader>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>Title</ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
        Description
      </ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
    </ExpansionPanelHeader>
    <ExpansionPanelContent>
      <ExpansionPanelContentBody>
        <TextField label="Sample text field" boxFocus={false} />
      </ExpansionPanelContentBody>
      <ExpansionPanelContentActions>
        <Button>Cancel</Button>
        <Button primary>Save</Button>
      </ExpansionPanelContentActions>
    </ExpansionPanelContent>
  </AutoExpansionPanel>

  <AutoExpansionPanel>
    <ExpansionPanelHeader>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>Title</ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
        Description
      </ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
        Another description
      </ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
    </ExpansionPanelHeader>
    <ExpansionPanelContent>
      <ExpansionPanelContentBody>Body content</ExpansionPanelContentBody>
    </ExpansionPanelContent>
  </AutoExpansionPanel>

  <AutoExpansionPanel>
    <ExpansionPanelHeader>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>
        Title
        <ExpansionPanelHeaderSubtitle>Subtitle</ExpansionPanelHeaderSubtitle>
      </ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>
      <ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
        Description
      </ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
    </ExpansionPanelHeader>
    <ExpansionPanelContent>
      <ExpansionPanelContentBody>Body content</ExpansionPanelContentBody>
    </ExpansionPanelContent>
  </AutoExpansionPanel>
</AutoExpansionPanelGroup>
```

Controlled expansion handling:

```js
class ExpansionPanelExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { index: -1 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <ExpansionPanelGroup>
        {[...Array(5).fill(null)].map((u, index) => (
          <ExpansionPanel key={index} expanded={this.state.index === index}>
            <ExpansionPanelHeader
              onClick={() => {
                this.setState(prevState => ({
                  index: prevState.index === index ? -1 : index
                }));
              }}
            >
              <ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>Title</ExpansionPanelHeaderTitle>
              <ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
                Description
              </ExpansionPanelHeaderDescription>
            </ExpansionPanelHeader>
            <ExpansionPanelContent expanded={this.state.index === index}>
              <ExpansionPanelContentBody>
                <TextField label="Sample text field" boxFocus={false} />
              </ExpansionPanelContentBody>
              <ExpansionPanelContentActions>
                <Button>Cancel</Button>
                <Button primary>Save</Button>
              </ExpansionPanelContentActions>
            </ExpansionPanelContent>
          </ExpansionPanel>
        ))}
      </ExpansionPanelGroup>
    );
  }
}

<ExpansionPanelExample />;
```
